title: Leaping sturgeon

properties.name: description
properties.value: The leaping sturgeon is a fish which requires 70 Fishing, 45 Strength, and 45 Agility to be caught, providing 80 Fishing experience, 7 Strength experience, and 7 Agility experience. It can be caught at Otto's Grotto or Mount Quidamortem with a barbarian rod and suitable bait after starting Barbarian Training.

Item ID11332

The leaping sturgeon is a fish which requires 70 Fishing, 45 Strength, and 45 Agility to be caught, providing 80 Fishing experience, 7 Strength experience, and 7 Agility experience. It can be caught at Otto's Grotto or Mount Quidamortem with a barbarian rod and suitable bait after starting Barbarian Training.

While it cannot be cooked, leaping sturgeon can be gutted with a knife, providing a chance of receiving caviar and 15 Cooking experience, and may also produce fish offcuts. There's a 1/80 (1.25%) chance of receiving caviar with level 1 Cooking, and 100% chance at level 80, scaling in-between.[1] If the player successfully receives caviar, they will be rewarded with 15 Cooking experience and a 5/6 chance of receiving fish offcuts as well. This is the only leaping fish to give caviar (which is sturgeon roe).
